parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application that was used to record the live stream.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name of the recorded live stream.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The query is performed based on the time range during which the required live streams were recorded. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The sorting rule of results. Valid values:
*   **CreationTime:Desc**: sorts the results based on the creation time in descending order. This is the default value.
*   **CreationTime:Asc**: sorts the results based on the creation time in ascending order.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The query is performed based on the time range during which the required live streams were recorded. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the recorded live stream.
